sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: 2.1: Number of activated and motivated Roma and other individuals at risk of social exclusion to enter the labour market 2.2: Number of assessments (individual employment plans) developed to support Roma and other individuals at risk of social exclusion to get employment 2.3: Number of unemployed Roma and people at risk of social exclusion engaged in ALMMs 2.4: Number of half-time employments created 2.5: Number of women that were half-time employed 2.6: Number of half-time engaged that successfully completed licensed trainings through CWP 2.7: Number of social services that were supported through CWP (Care economy measures) 2.8: Number of end-beneficiaries that got the service through CWP (Care economy measures) 2.9: Number of unemployed people trained on community care services through Care economy (pilot) measures 2.10: Number of full-time employments through Care economy (pilot) measures

comment.narrative: 2.1: 3750 2.2: 3250 2.3: 340 2.4: 500 2.5: 420 2.6: 356 2.7: 10 2.8: 8500 2.9: 189 (training have started. Not yet completed) 2.10: Employment will start upon completion of trainings.
New targets will be set upon signing ProDoc Revision.
